borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2019/01760/FUL granted 16th August 2018 for the 'Excavation of part of the rear and front garden to form a rear lightwell in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement and the creation of a storage room to front part of the basement; installation of grille to form a covering above the front lightwell; erection of new rear side boundary wall with cedar trellis on top, new cedar trellis on top of the front side boundary wall to match existing height and re-location of the timber entrance gate at the side elevation; erection of new external staircase from basement to ground floor level and formation of new bin stores at the front of the property; installation of a rooflight above the roof of second floor rear back addition.' Amendments to include relocation of the approved bin stores from the front of the property to the rear garden and alterations to part of the rear side boundary wall.
